item.title: Lockdown setup - Working with an IPEVO document camera
item.author: Author
item.description: As most of us, we’re working from home for some time. Here is a quick start guide for the IPEVO V4K document camera. Installation Hardware The camera itself is a plug-and-play device: it’s recognized as a camera. Two buttons on it to enable/disable the autofocus and adjust the exposure. Software Go to https://www.ipevo.com/software/visualizer#download As you can see, the IPEVO visualizer is supported by several platforms: In the following parts, we’ll try to work with the Linux binary and the Chrome plugin
